attributes.description: At East Rand Toyota, we learn from the past, build on the present and anticipate the future. At East Rand Toyota we promise; nationwide delivery, Trade Ins welcomed and please have peace of mind knowing that every vehicle is subject to a Check List. Speak to our Finance department for tailored financial packages to suit your needs.

attributes.description:
EXTRAS: Led Headlamps, Rline Sa, Driving Profile Selection, Sports Comfort Seats In Front, Rear View Camera System, Park Assist With Park Distance Control, Front Fog Lamps And Cornering Light, Infotainment Package Composition Media, Mobile Phone Interface, App-connect, Driver Alert System, Hill Start Assist, Park Package, Chrome Package, Lights & Vision Package, Cruise Control System, Tire Pressure Monitoring System, Exterior Mirrors Power Adj, Folding & Heated 
This is a Brand-New Vehicle. You at the right place - three times “VOLKSWAGEN DEALER OF THE YEAR” & nine times “VOLKSWAGEN CLUB OF EXCELLENCE” winners. Rated # 1 in Service! Nationwide delivery, Fantastic Trade-in offers, In-house vehicle finance services offered with all major banks.  We specialise in online sales, no need to leave your home.  * All specials and discounted stock are subject to in-house finance * Listed price excludes all fees/costs.  * Some pictures might vary from actual vehicle, we do our best to ensure accuracy : )  Our General Sales Manager is Marco Meijer.
